hero.content:
Joma Sison on terror tag, America, and karaoke

Two decades ago, the world seemed to close in on the exiled chief of the Communist Party of the Philippines, who was then declared a terrorist by the European Union (Rest in peace)

rappler.com

primary.title: The Philippines Has the World's Longest Christmas Celebration
primary.description: Perhaps no country on Earth loves Christmas more than the Philippines. Residents there celebrate the holiday for four months solid. Here's why.

secondary.title: Meet the Mariah Carey of the Philippines’ Christmas Season
secondary.description: Jose Mari Chan is a 77-year-old sugar magnate and singer whose holiday hit has made him a national icon

secondary.title: Pinoy faithful gather for 9-day Simbang Gabi
secondary.description: The traditional pre-dawn novena masses, popularly known as “Simbang Gabi” in the Philippines, will officially start today.

secondary.title: Philippine giant lantern festival resumes with historical ties to Japan
secondary.description: A century-old giant lantern festival in the Philippines has resumed after a three-year hiatus from in-person celebrations due to COVID-19 restrictions, with spectators enjoying the festivity that has historical links with Japan.

carousel.title: The Fight Over Manila's Last Forests: Masungi Watershed | The Last Defenders | Philippines
carousel.description: The Masungi Georeserve in the Philippines is a nature sanctuary near the capital, Metro Manila. It also serves as a vital watershed that helps prevent floods and landslides affecting over 14 million people.

carousel.title: Philippines utility considers using nuclear energy technology | NHK WORLD-JAPAN News
carousel.description: The Philippines' largest electricity distributor has said it is in talks with the United States about possibly using a new form of nuclear energy technology.

carousel.title: Pinoy Pride: Sofia Frank, 2022 Asian Open Figure Skating gold medalist
carousel.description: Pinay figure skater Sofia Lexi Jacqueline Frank brought honor to the country snatching the highly-coveted gold medal at the recently concluded 2022 Asian Open Figure Skating competition held in Jakarta, Indonesia.
